Redefining Professional Cleaning Services

Crown Standard is Canada's leading platform connecting customers with verified, professional cleaning services. We've built a trusted community where quality meets convenience, making professional cleaning accessible to everyone.

Home/About Crown Standard

Redefining Professional Cleaning Services

Crown Standard is Canada's leading platform connecting customers with verified, professional cleaning services. We've built a trusted community where quality meets convenience, making professional cleaning accessible to everyone.

Our Mission

At Crown Standard, we believe that everyone deserves a clean, comfortable living and working environment. Our mission is to revolutionize the cleaning service industry by creating a seamless, trustworthy platform that benefits both customers seeking quality services and professionals looking to grow their businesses.

For Customers

  • Connect customers with trusted, professional cleaning services
  • Provide flexible earning opportunities for service providers
  • Maintain the highest standards of quality and safety

For Service Providers

  • Build a community based on trust, reliability, and excellence
  • Make professional cleaning accessible to everyone

Why Choose Crown Standard?

We built our platform with both customers and providers in mind— focusing on trust, quality, and convenience.

Verified & Insured

All providers pass background checks and carry insurance for your peace of mind.

Flexible Scheduling

Book services that fit your schedule with same-day and next-day options.

Quality Guaranteed

Our satisfaction guarantee means we’ll make it right, every time.

Trusted Community

Join thousands of satisfied customers and professional cleaners.

Mobile-First Experience

Real-time updates, GPS tracking, and instant messaging on the go.

Secure Payments

Safe payment processing with multiple options and transparent pricing.

Why Choose Crown Standard?

Trusted by thousands, backed by quality, and powered by convenience.

How Crown Standard Works

Simple, secure, and reliable – booking professional cleaning services has never been easier.

For Customers

  • 1
    Browse Services

    Explore verified cleaners in your area with detailed profiles and reviews.

  • 2
    Book & Pay

    Select your preferred date, time, and service details. Pay securely online.

  • 3
    Relax & Enjoy

    Track your booking, communicate with your cleaner, and enjoy the results.

For Customers
